about_the_game:
Mystic Tesserae is a game that combines Falling Sand simulation and a chill experience, where you use elements and spells to mould the world according to your will. Use elements to interact with every pixel you see (and even the ones you don't). The Mages can use powerful Spells, collect items and interact with this world.

Gameplay 

  • Use a variety of Elements to discover the interactions between them.

  • Use powerful Spells to eliminate Enemies and get their loot.

  • Craft and build according to your imagination 

Features

  • Falling Sand

    • Falling sand simulation where all pixels are simulated.

    • Use your imagination to overcome challenges.

    • Use your creativity to build beautiful and uniques designs

  • Sandbox

    • Create buildings and even whole forests according to your desires.

  • 2.5D

    • Unique perspective, being able to see what is behind and bellow other elements.

  • Circuits

    • Create circuits using different metals and electrons.

    • With a "third" dimension, this can get as complex as you wish.
